xmlText.p: First Period_1, Colorado, Kerfoot 13 (C.Wilson, Zadorov), 0:43. 2, Buffalo, Pouliot 11 (O'Reilly), 7:57 (sh). 3, Colorado, Nieto 10, 9:19 (sh). Penalties_Nolan, BUF, (high sticking), 6:45; Colorado bench, served by Greer (too many men on the ice), 8:57; Scandella, BUF, (slashing), 15:52; S.Wilson, BUF, (high sticking), 17:42; Colorado bench, served by Jost (faceoff violation), 17:42.

Second Period_4, Colorado, C.Wilson 5 (Landeskog), 1:07. 5, Buffalo, Nelson 1 (Falk, O'Reilly), 13:15 (sh). Penalties_Zadorov, COL, (holding), 3:20; Josefson, BUF, (holding), 6:34; Barrie, COL, (slashing), 8:40; Nolan, BUF, (holding), 11:45.

Third Period_6, Colorado, Jost 5 (Barrie, Rantanen), 3:05 (pp). 7, Colorado, Bourque 5 (Lindholm), 7:03. 8, Buffalo, O'Reilly 17 (Okposo, Ristolainen), 12:14 (pp). 9, Buffalo, Kane 18, 17:08. Penalties_Larsson, BUF, (boarding), 2:34; Greer, COL, (interference), 10:42; Soderberg, COL, (hooking), 12:06.
Goalies_Colorado, Bernier 17-10-2 (32 shots-28 saves). Buffalo, Lehner 12-21-7 (27-22).
Referees_Jon Mclsaac, Chris Rooney. Linesmen_Devin Berg, Kory Nagy.
